mapper.sql: USERNAME, GROUP_NAME, PASSWORD, GENDER, REALNAME, DEPARTMENT, EMAIL, PHONE_NO, AVATAR, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, LAST_PASSWORD_TIME, ISDELETE
mapper.insert: insert into user (USERNAME, GROUP_NAME, PASSWORD, GENDER, REALNAME, DEPARTMENT, EMAIL, PHONE_NO, AVATAR, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, LAST_PASSWORD_TIME, ISDELETE) values (#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupName,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastPasswordTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isdelete,jdbcType=TINYINT})

mapper.update:
update user
GROUP_NAME = #{groupName,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GENDER = #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
